from workflowInstance
order by ${orderByClause}

update workflowInstance
workflowId = #{workflowid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sender = #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
attachmentId = #{attachmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activeNode = #{activenode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
canbeEdit = #{canbeedit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update workflowInstance set workflowId = #{workflowid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attachmentId = #{attachmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activeNode = #{activenode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, canbeEdit = #{canbeedit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select wfi.*, wf.id as workflowtypeId from workflowInstance as wfi left join workflow as wf on wfi.workflowId = wf.id
where wfi.id = #{wfiId}
